job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: <p>Lakarya is Hiring for one our Clients</p><p><strong>Position: Data Scientist /Data Analyst</strong></p><p><strong>Location: Highpoint, NC</strong></p><p><strong>Job type: Long term Contract</strong></p><p><strong>Job Description</strong></p><ul><li>Manage administration and supervise the development of logistics policies and programs to ensure they meet the changing conditions in program requirements.</li><li>Prepare and present membership changes to large audience including senior staff using PowerPoint.</li><li>Develop reports using IBM Cognos as part of the migration of a particular customer.</li><li>Coded/Maintain a SAS program including embed SQL written by consultants for use in manual claim forecasting.</li><li>Analyze the existing BO universe and provide the guidelines to migrate and implementation effect of Cognos.</li><li>Develop dashboards and trend reports that keep track of utilization volume, cost, and quality performance.</li><li>Serve as project officer/team leader; provide direction and guidance to contractors and support to DoD personnel.</li><li>Involve in development for highly complicate reports, scorecards and dashboards for a specific business needs and performance improvement.</li><li>Develop routine SAS macros to create tables, graphs and listings for inclusion in reports and maintain existing ones.</li><li>Devise new improve procedure (by use of VBA) to create campus tables that saves time and ensures accuracy.</li></ul><p>Job Types: Full-time, Contract</p>
